channel.title: [low priority] Various Visual Bugs
channel.description:
I encountered multiple minor visual bugs.
First of, a reflecting air duct, taht reflected light from outside. [youtube.com/watch?v=VyUmjEg2PAU](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VyUmjEg2PAU)
Next i have found a red dot on a wall after i threw a grenade. It stayed there indefinitely. [youtube.com/watch?v=87ctwy59gp4](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=87ctwy59gp4)
Flickering Smoke or distance Fog depending on viewpoint [youtube.com/watch?v=w6A59tj52lU](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=w6A59tj52lU)
And last but the weirdest. A visual as if the player just got out of the water each time you switch weapons to the crossbow while looking at water. [youtube.com/watch?v=Fj_aVjVrwgM](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Fj_aVjVrwgM)
If you have any tips for improving my bug reporting, I'm happy to learn.

Sorry about that

item.description:

The red specular which has no origin.
youtu.be/kPOEY4C4MaY

Barney is reloading his 357er like the glock.
youtu.be/KD99mZY0HV4

item.title: [low priority] Various Visual Bugs

item.description:
To finish :

bugs with flying object everywhere just before FaF after the following radio tower.

2015-05-10_00033.jpg1920×1080 198 KB
2015-05-10_00032.jpg1920×1080 218 KB

Red light on the floor after exploding some turrets with a grenade just before Lambda Sector

2015-05-10_00028.jpg1920×1080 537 KB

That’s the old model of the Tau cannon on the floor in Questionnable Ethics

2015-05-10_00027.jpg1920×1080 652 KB

Read full topic

item.title: [low priority] Various Visual Bugs
item.dc:creator: Ulrik
item.description:
More bugs in Surface Tension and Forget About Freeman :

Broken Script just before the armory. The guard seems missing animations as aim me when he says “Freeze !” or don’t tap the code to open the armory.

2015-05-10_00031.jpg1920×1080 800 KB

After the big battle before the gargantua, there is no animation with the doors closing. The door is open when loading begin, the door is closed when loading is finished.

2015-05-10_00026.jpg1920×1080 621 KB

The gargantua has a foot in mid-air at that point

2015-05-10_00025.jpg1920×1080 533 KB

Lots of clipping on the pad. The cursor seems disappearing randomly and the button “Fire” is clipping.

2015-05-10_00024.jpg1920×1080 275 KB

Seems that Mortar shells prefer to do emergency avoidance on doors…

2015-05-10_00021.jpg1920×1080 579 KB

Flying tubes just before FaF

2015-05-10_00017.jpg1920×1080 399 KB
2015-05-10_00016.jpg1920×1080 213 KB

All along the game, a lot of bugs with AI who, at a certain distance, does not attack me even they see me.
Usually, it’s vortigaunt but sometimes it’s soldiers and Alien Grunts.
Exemple with this soldier on FaF.

2015-05-10_00014.jpg1920×1080 192 KB

Read full topic

item.title: [low priority] Various Visual Bugs
item.dc:creator: Ulrik
item.description:
MrChocodemon:

I think that this is not a real bug. It’s propably just the way they implemented the reflections. What is your setting for reclections?

My settings are all at Maximum, looks at these two pictures, it clearly show that there is bug just by moving slightly to the right :

2015-05-10_00002.jpg1920×1080 464 KB
2015-05-10_00001.jpg1920×1080 390 KB

Another bug found at the beginning of Residue Processing, flying objects :

2015-05-10_00003.jpg1920×1080 440 KB

Read full topic

What is your setting for reclections?

item.title: [low priority] Various Visual Bugs
item.dc:creator: Myth_Alex
item.description:
MrChocodemon:

Background zoom is view dependant, if you zoom with the crossbow, the backgrounds get smaller
youtube.com/watch?v=Vq_GReXMVrk

here it is again
youtube.com/watch?v=vXOFt1eWibc

and here you can see it perfectly
youtube.com/watch?v=taF6IT31BC4

I can also confirm this strange bug.

Please, fix it !!!

Read full topic
